info.description: Display information about a specific champion

lanechamps.description: Display a list of champions for a specific lane

random.description: Randomly display champions from specified lane or all lanes (1-10 champions: default 1)
random.count: Number of champions to randomly select (1-10)
random.wr_only: Limit to Wild Rift implemented champions only (default: true)

team.description: Randomly select 2 champions from each lanes, total 10 champions (no duplicates)
team.wr_only: Limit to Wild Rift implemented champions only (default: true)

winrate.description: Check champion's win rate in WILD RIFT

lanewinrate.description: Display top 5 win rates by lane

pickrate.description: Display top 5 pick rates by lane

strength.description: Display champions as evaluated by the system
